Reviews.Title: LG VX8360
Reviews.Author: WTstudent
Reviews.Content: I absolutly love this phone. I had the same model for 3 years (and I am extremely hard on phones as I am always outdoors). It held up great. Survived water, snow, being ran over by the car, and dropped thousands of times. It's a great all-around phone with all the basic needs. When it came time to finally replace my original model I spent weeks trying to find a phone I liked as much... but ended up ordering the same phon off the internet instead.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever.
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 3 years and two months. Up until about two weeks ago it still worked great. I accidently got it wet numerous times and each time it wouldn't work for a day or two but once it dried out, it worked again just like new. The battery life is still just as great as ever. I did finally get it wet and slightly soapy accidently about 2 weeks ago and the phone is now shutting off at random times and the number 4 doesn't always work. I have dropped this phone numerous times without issue. Sometimes hard enough for the batter to go flying off. IT TOOK THREE YEARS OF ABUSE TO WEAR THIS PHONE OUT. Obviously it doesn't have all the bells and whistles, but for texting and talking, and perhaps listening to music (I accidently downloaded a full song when I first got it... (I don't need songs on my phone so I didn't download any more) and it plays externally quite nicely. I was surprised by how well the external speaker works!) it is a great phone! I seriuosly think LG and/or Verizon made a mistake with this phone. I don't think anything is supposed to last more than 6 months anymore, but I got three years of use which, although not beneficial for them, was awesome for me!!!

Reviews.Title: just a  phone
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: easy to use flip phone  already had previous ... my husband's destroyed 2 so had to replace it  I am happy with mine so got him the same one

Reviews.Title: lg vx8360
Reviews.Author: tw
Reviews.Content: orded phone for my husband fast shipping the phone got here fast . my husband loves the phone .he said very easy to work . an works real good will get him aonther one when he needs a new one.

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: seeya
Reviews.Content: The service was great, phone was as said it would be and works great. Thanks. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Clark
Reviews.Content: This is a great basic phone.  It has an easy to read display, the keyboard is large enough to operate efficently.  It has all the necessary features incluing camera in a small package.  I have used this type of phone for the last five years it is very durable.

Reviews.Title: LGVX8360
Reviews.Author: Kathy Orsi
Reviews.Content: Phone works well the only problem is the ringtones at the highest level are very hard to hear at times.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Adro
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace my 4 year old cell phone with the same model and without entering another Verizon contract and was happy to find it available.  The phone is as advertised and as expected and the delivery was very prompt.  Had it in 3 business days with free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Steer clear of this seller
Reviews.Author: Anne Appel
Reviews.Content: This 'new in the box' cell phone at a price of $100.00 didn't work.The battery that I also purchased was 'dead'. I bought a new$40.00 battery for it and it still didn't work.

Reviews.Title: used LG VX8360
Reviews.Author: karen rychorcewicz
Reviews.Content: I had this  type of phone before, but I broke the hinge. It did meet my expectations. This phone is easy to use and I like the familiarity of it. It was in very good condition considering it was used. My only complaint is that a few of the buttons are harder to push than others when texting. Otherwise, it is a good deal. For under $25, I got a phone and I didn't have to use my upgrade on my phone plan.

Reviews.Title: Back with my dream-phone!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn C
Reviews.Content: Had this phone before my last Samsung flip-phone, which I hated, and was thrilled to see I could still buy this LG one again. It's exactly what I need, does everything well. The simple camera takes very nice photos, which you can edit and save. Easy to text, great sound, good selection of nice ring-tones. My last phone couldn't set a wallpaper on the front, this can. Easy to see and access clock on front. E-mail is tiny, so not a big user on this, but in an emergency, I can get and send an e-mail. Just want a great, easy to use flip-phone that's very small and thin, and fits in a pocket, and this is it. I wish Verizon would offer it again - it seems their flip-phones are getting cruddy, b/c IMO they want everyone to switch to smartphones, with their high-priced data plans.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the purchse
Reviews.Author: Noel C.
Reviews.Content: Purchase this for my mother in law.  Seller responded promptly with my question.  And it does work as it says.  Works with Verizon existing plan.

Reviews.Title: Can'tbuy anymore ...too bad
Reviews.Author: David Outerbridge
Reviews.Content: The phone is easy to use, small, and strong. I raise horses and I don't want a phone that I have to hunt to get what I want. This is a "no brainer" phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Content: Works better than I expected and it arrived quickly WITH a charger!Staying away from those smartphones for now.I had my other phone for 4 years. Wanted to replace it.Very pleased with this product and seller.

Reviews.Title: Very happy phone
Reviews.Author: Steve Rozak
Reviews.Content: It was just what I was looking for.  It is simple and easy.  The phone was very clean, very happy with the shipping and condition.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love the Phone-replacement was good shape
Reviews.Author: Carol In Ohio
Reviews.Content: Already had this phone and it is exactly what my husband wants-just a phone.  He had a Samsung Knack because that is about all that Verizon offered in a simple phone.  He was very displeased with the battery life and the dependability of the phone.  When I got a new smart phone, we switched my old LG VX8360 and got rid of his Samsung.  Then when his phone got wet we wanted to replace it with the same phone.  This phone is very dependable and easy to use.  We had the first phone 6 years before the accident.  Battery life is great too.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Yo daddy "Don't blame me, I'm just the messen...
Reviews.Content: This phone is light weight, and no nonsense easy to use. Perfect for my mom who needed a phone. Although it's only been a few weeks, I'm sure it will last as long as other LG phones I've had. They seem to build quality handsets.

Reviews.Title: Had a very short life
Reviews.Author: Jerry J Lambert
Reviews.Content: Bought this for sister in law.  After 2 weeks, she took it back to Verizon and they told her it was a piece of junk, that the battery was no good, and sold her another new one.  She was not happy at all.

Reviews.Title: LG VX8360/Books
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the item and delivery time of the LG VX8360.I have not yet read the books but received them on my KINDLE timely.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Shamus Harmon
Reviews.Content: This is the exact same phone I've been using for years.  After many years the hinge on my old one broke, and thankfully I was able to replace it.  Though used this model might just have well come straight from the factory.  I look forward to many more years of use.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: nyMom "JRR"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a phone to replace on that my daughter had lost.  I wanted something simple and sturdy and got it.  It does the job.  A great phone for a kid who you dont feel should have data yet.

Reviews.Title: LG
Reviews.Author: Cassandra Law
Reviews.Content: LG MAKES GOOD PHONES THAT LAST AND ARE VERY EASY TO USE AND OPERATE. I NEVER HAVE A PROBLEM WHEN I HAVE MINE EXCEPT FOR ALL THE WEAR AND TEAR I PUT IT THRU. IF YOU ARE ROUGH ON PHONES THIS IS A GOOD ONE TO HAVE

Reviews.Title: Basic phone.
Reviews.Author: michael crites
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic phone with few bells and whistlesfor someone that is not interestedin anything but verbalizing a conversation.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for same model
Reviews.Author: Roger Brandt
Reviews.Content: My prior phone was the same model.  Its not fancy I only use for texting and phone calls. However, the last phone lasted 6 years with  many drops from a few feet.  so its durable.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: K. Jenae
Reviews.Content: After having this phone for 6yrs a least I have bought used phone in the same model (no new learning curve :) ). Reception has been good, speaker  good quality (I play music on this phone a LOT) and I use multiple other features on it regularly. The only thing I would add/change would be to add a zoom feature to the camera (have really missed this!) and made it less 'slick' to have in my hands. I probably wouldn't have had to replace it if it was less slick.

Reviews.Title: Good Overall Everday Phone
Reviews.Author: Brianna
Reviews.Content: I first had ordered a samsung knack that did not receive or make calls out but activated fine with verizon so wasent happy with those results.  i sent it back and got my refund and ordered this lg vx8360 after emailing them back and forth to make sure it was going to work with my network and activate and actaully make and receive calls they said i shouldnt of had trouble with the other phone and were confident thatbthis phone was going to work  but still i was skeptical on my second order.......  so anyway i recieved the phone 2 days before actual delivery date and phone is working perfect and in great mint condition.

Reviews.Title: a cell phone without a plan
Reviews.Author: Richard Maughn
Reviews.Content: This phone is durable,  trouble free, and there aren't any data charges. The camera isn't much, but its good enough.

Reviews.Title: LGVX8360 phone very nice...:)
Reviews.Author: Pam Hutchins
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone got it for my husband he does not like all the fancy features of the newer phones. This one is more advanced than some of the flip phones it does have the blue tooth which comes in handy while driving. Very nice people to deal with shipped very fast.

Reviews.Title: Shipped wrong product
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: Shipped wrong product, but I have another LG VX8360 and love it as a basic phone to TALK with and take a few basic pictures, which with micro SD card as easy to retrieve from it.

Reviews.Title: Migrated back to this from the Android world
Reviews.Author: Stuart Uggen
Reviews.Content: This LG series has provided excellent service for my wife and I for about three years, maybe more. Audio quality seems above average for cell phones and battery life is quite good. I came back to this phone after about a year in the Android world, and have come to prefer separate devices for GPS (Garmin Nuvi), cell phone (this LG), and PDA (Ipod Touch). I seldom need all three, and rarely need internet access where there is no WiFi service. So, I have better cell phone performance without the monthly data plan expense.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: c hansen
Reviews.Content: efficient , fair and helpful.  Would use them again for another purchase.Highly recommended for those in need of their products.

Reviews.Title: Durable/ great
Reviews.Author: ebigk
Reviews.Content: The LG VX8360 is a very durable phone. If you drop this phone while holding it, worst case scenario according to my opinion is that the phone would chip a corner, but an iphone would break instantly, and you would have $300 to pay to repairs for iPhone.Also a great phone for kids or teens because if they lose it, i mean its only like $50 rather than a $299 phone. Also great for people who don't have or don't want to have internet for parents, grandparents, kids.....I only rate it a 3, because I compared to what phones these days can do. Back 2-4 year a go out of 5 it would get a 6.

Reviews.Title: Woot!
Reviews.Author: Tess
Reviews.Content: I have someone in my life who is hard on phones and wanted a general flip phone. After having a few that did not do the job or had poor sound, we came across this one. He could not be any happier with the quality of the phone and the sound quality. It is slim so there is not much to worry about when it is in your pocket, it fits comfortably.

Reviews.Title: LG VX8360
Reviews.Author: JIMMIE
Reviews.Content: The phone performance greatI like the phone and have no dislikeI would recommened this phone to others buy

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph Link Murray
Reviews.Content: I needed a simple cell phone when mine broke. This phone was a good value and has more features than expected.  Speaker phone is better than previous phone I had.  I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: LG VX8360 Phone
Reviews.Author: Evelyn
Reviews.Content: My dad had this phone before and wanted to get another one but it was no longer for sale at the store. I found it online and ordered it for him. He is happy with it.

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: VET
Reviews.Content: Works as expected, don't need more words, waste of time with to many words expected, good reason to not write any review

Reviews.Title: vx8360
Reviews.Author: blessed
Reviews.Content: I am sure the product must be good for someone else, but it didn't meet my needs. It didn't work with my current plan, so it didn't serve the intended purpose.

Reviews.Title: Good phone if not broken
Reviews.Author: AmazonianCustardMore
Reviews.Content: USB charge port is loose and won't charge. Options button doesnt work. Phone returned. word word word word word word

Reviews.Title: Lg VX8360
Reviews.Author: chucke2000
Reviews.Content: Had a phone like this before this one & was happy with it, not as sure about this this phone.

Reviews.Title: all products returned because of phone
Reviews.Author: meredith guirguis
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with phone, they returned the money and i'm satisfied with the outcome.I felt that the phone was not as they described.

Reviews.Title: npot new as listed
Reviews.Author: stuart arthur
Reviews.Content: This was listed on amazon as a new phone. It was not. It worked fine and it was a very good price so I did not return it.
